article_title: Thanksgiving at latest possible date this year, but shoppers appear unfazed

article_metadata.keywords: Business, News, Local, Megan Hart, Local business

og.description: Thanksgiving is at its latest possible date this year, but it likely won't make much difference in a shopping season that now begins long before its traditional kickoff.
og.title: Thanksgiving at latest possible date this year, but shoppers appear unfazed

article_metadata.description: Thanksgiving is at its latest possible date this year, but it likely won’t make much difference in a shopping season that now begins long before its traditional kickoff.Congress passed a law in 1941 designating Thanksgiving as the fourth Thursday of November, so Nov. 28 is the latest possible date for it — arguably compressing the Christmas shopping season compared to last year, when Thanksgiving was celebrated Nov. 22.
